title: How to get a 50% discount on the GRE test - Quora

response.answer_text: To apply for a 50% fee reduction for the GRE, you need to complete a specific form from ETS that can be found here: https://www.ets.org/s/gre/pdf/gre_fee_reduction_request_form.pdf. If you are approved for the 50% reduction, you’ll also receive free access to the PowerPrep Plus practice exams as well as the ScoreItNow AWA grading tool. Lastly, once you receive the voucher, you can use it when registering for your GRE.
